Docs.summary: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a key event is dispatched to this dialog.

remarks.para: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a key event is dispatched to this dialog. The callback will be invoked before the key event is given to the dialog.

the dialog the key has been dispatched to

Docs.summary: Called when a key is dispatched to a dialog.
Docs.returns: true if the listener has consumed the event, false otherwise

remarks.para: Called when a key is dispatched to a dialog. This allows listeners to get a chance to respond before the dialog.
